item.title: The 11.11 Shopping Festival at Lazada guarantees a more enjoyable experience for everyone involved
item.description:
This year’s Lazada 11.11 Shopping Festival is breaking records with over 50 million deals, a significant increase from last year’s 27 million. The event will involve over 400,000 sellers and brands, almost triple the number from the previous year. Lazada, a leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia, organizes this yearly event to demonstrate the convenience and affordability of online shopping. For 24 hours, starting at midnight on November 11th, shoppers across six countries will have access to incredible deals on a wide range of products, with discounts of up to 90%...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-11-11-shopping-festival-at-lazada-guarantees-a-more-enjoyable-experience-for-everyone-involved/

item.title: Ten million transactions during the Lazada Mid-Year Festival
item.description:
Lazada’s first sale since its rebranding offers 10 million deals. Lazada’s shoppertainment approach is enhanced with the first region-wide livestreamed gameshow. LazGames now includes a leaderboard and brand customization options. On July 12th, Lazada will host its first-ever mid-year sale event, the Lazada Mid-Year Festival, throughout six Southeast Asian countries. Consumers will have access to product discounts ranging from well-known brands to recent releases and one-of-a-kind items from 12:00 a...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ten-million-transactions-during-the-lazada-mid-year-festival/

item.title: Singtel's Dash is running a flash campaign offering mystery cashback for purchases made on Lazada.SG
item.description:
Source: Android Play Store. Singtel’s mobile payment app, Dash, is holding a short promotional campaign with online store Lazada.SG. From October 2nd to 9th, 2015, shoppers can receive a surprise cashback reward of 15% to 50%*. Each day of the campaign features a “Dash Happy Hour.” During this limited time frame, which lasts up to two hours, customers using Dash to pay for purchases on Lazada.SG can earn cashback. The specific cashback amount won’t be disclosed until the end of each day and will be added to customer accounts within three business days...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-s-dash-is-running-a-flash-campaign-offering-mystery-cashback-for-purchases-made-on-lazada-sg/
